name: Interior Painting
description: Not only do we take time to give you a BEAUTIFUL paint job, but we also take time to keep your house clean during AND after the project. On our larger projects where lots of dust is created, we even hire cleaning companies to come in after us and dust, sweep, vacuum, and mop ALL affected areas.

name: Exterior Painting
description: As you know, the most important part of ANY paint job is the preparation. Whether your exterior is wood, stucco, cement fiber board, or any other material, we take the time to properly prepare all surfaces so the paint bonds well and looks great... for years to come!

name: Restoration Painting
description: We love our restorations... because no one comes close to the amount of care and preparation we put into making sure the exterior surfaces of your house are restored to the best condition possible before we even THINK of applying any finish coats.

name: Wood Restorations
description: We use only the best penetrating stains and UV-resistant sealers to preserve and enhance your wood. Our high-build clear coats provide a thick, durable layer of protection to keep your wood stunning and safe.

name: Decorative Finishes
description: Transform your space with elegance. From wall glazing and wood graining to marblizing and venetian plasters, we bring artistic finishes that turn your project into a masterpiece.

name: Cabinet and Woodwork Finishing
description: We restore beauty and durability to wood furniture and cabinetry using premium materials and expert techniques, whether itâ€™s an antique chair or a whole kitchen cabinet set.

name: Commercial Painting
description: From new production to historical restoration, we have completed high-profile commercial painting jobs across Utah. We ensure projects are done well, to spec, and on time.

name: Concrete Finishes
description: From cleaning and sealing garage floors to staining restaurant flooring with beautiful decorative finishes, we provide durable, eye-catching concrete surface work.
